div.div:
The Bristol Public Schools has created a dynamic and robust learning experience for our scholars. Please click here to access learning plans.
A technical assistance guide has been designed for all users within our community related to distance learning. The user guide covers topics for teachers and students. Click here to access the Technology and Distance Learning Guide.

tr.td: The Bristol All-Heart Hotline has been established for Bristol residents in need of social services or other support during this public health emergency. The phone number is: 860-584-6253. The hotline is structured for residents who are confined to their home, are elderly and thus at risk if they go to the grocery store, people with transportation issues, families who can’t reach the School Food Distribution Sites, and other situations.

div.div: Bristol Public Schools has moved to phase III of the food distribution plan. Please click here for more information.
